item.description: Hi ladies! I have created this group because I am finding it difficult to attend Meet-Ups in the city and figured there must be many other wonderful women looking to make new friends on the South Shore. I am in my late thirties, never married and have no kids.  I am back in the dating world but never take my "girl" time for granted. This group is for anyone who would like to meet some great gals, regardless of marital status or whether or not you have children. I love going to see live bands, catching a flick, hitting the beach, doing something athletic, or just relaxing with a nice glass of wine. I do love hitting the city, but it would be great to have some local activities scheduled as well.
item.name: South Shores' Fabulous Females Unite!
